dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5498 IH: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to provide to certain aliens covered shelter or housing on military installations located in the United States.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Malliotakis (for herself and Mr. Carter of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to provide to certain aliens covered shelter or housing on military installations located in the United States.

section.header: Prohibition on use of Federal funds to provide shelter or housing on certain military installations to certain aliens

subsection.text: None of the funds authorized to be appropriated or otherwise made available for any fiscal year made be used to provide covered shelter or housing for specified aliens on military installations located in any of the 50 States or the District of Columbia.

paragraph.text: The term covered shelter or housing means shelter or housing provided to specified aliens pursuant to an applicable Federal, State, or local law, regulation, or order.
The term military installation has the meaning given such term in section 2801 of title 10, United States Code.
The term specified alien means an alien (as defined in section 101 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1101 et seq.) who has not been admitted (as defined in such section).
